sentence.Network_en: Sadly, the film is let down by an excessively simple plot.

sentences.en: She shook her dark curls sadly.
sentences.cn: 她悲痛地摇动她的黑色鬈发。

sentences.en: They sadly surveyed the scene before them.
sentences.cn: 他们悲伤地环视眼前的情景。

sentences.en: “I can’t marry you,” she responded sadly.
sentences.cn: “我不能嫁给你,”她悲伤地回答。

sentences.en: The incident has sadly only served to highlight the differences within the party.
sentences.cn: 令人痛心的是，这一事件仅仅凸显了政党内部存在的种种分歧。

sentences.en: New Shoreham, now sadly decayed, has barely 100 inhabitants.
sentences.cn: 如今已经衰落的新肖勒姆仅有100 名居民，很令人伤感。

sentences.en: The spirit of fair play is sadly missing from the sport these days.
sentences.cn: 如今的体育运动缺少遵守规则的精神，令人遗憾。

sentences.en: She put down the phone, sighed, and shook her head sadly.
sentences.cn: 她放下电话, 叹着气, 惋惜地摇了摇头。

sentences.en: His mother is now sadly deceased.
It is a sadly neglected work.
